title: Whatever Her Stepbrother Wants
description: Katie isn’t just a backdoor bad girl, she wants to try everything, with multiple guys. But her older stepbrother, Frank is looking out for her best interests. He first discovers Katie’s secret desires when he finds the erotica she has been writing about him, revealing her dark sexual fantasies. It isn’t too late for Katie, she is still a virgin, and hasn’t yet acted on her desires. But Frank plans to take care of that, when he claims his little stepsister’s virginity and then takes her sweet backside.Knowing Katie needs more, Frank gives her what she craves, by giving her to his friends, making her the sweetheart of the gangbang. When she moves in with Frank, their parents are shocked to discover the two are now a couple. Yet, the parents have no idea what is really going on, and the true relationship of the stepsiblings.Adult Erotica. 10211 (approximate)
author: Maggie Chatterley
